import React from 'react'; import Layout from '../components/layout'; import Head from 'next/head'; import styles from './index-styles.module.css'; import PostTitle from '../components/post-title'; import Container from '../components/container'; import macbookPro from '../public/assets/images/macbook_pro_dataline.png'; import danieLogo from '../public/assets/images/logo.svg'; const Index: React.FC = () => { return ( <>
DANIE

A community of financial institutions harnessing the latest privacy enhancing technology to collaborate and share insights securely.

Datalign benchmarks all types of datasets

if youve ever wanbted to compare sensitive data with peers, but were worried about data privacy, we can help.

Each party has control of their own data, but no ties to the other participants. Datalign is easy to use and can pricess more than 2000 records per second

what makes Datalign Unique?

Datalign is a decentralised soloution built for collaboration.

Each party has control of their own data, but no ties to the other participants. Datalign is easy to use and can pricess more than 2000 records per second

The only tested soloution proven to maintain complete privacy for data collaboration

Datalign has been used by some of the largest banks in the world and has alredy been trailed to succesfullt reconcile millions of records across peers securely

It is part of the product suite for the DANIE group: a community of finacical instiations harnessing the altes pricvacy and enhancing technology to collaborate and share insight securely.

Who's behind Datalign

Secretarium

Datalign is built by Secretarium a deep tech start up specliaisng in crytopgraphy, Privacy Enhancing Technologies and Privacy

Intel

Datalign by Secretarium is supported by intel with the latest hardware and engineering collaboration

Swisscom

Datalign can be hosted by Secretarium's partner Swisscom to benefit from Swiss privacy law and neutral jurisdiction

Partner Enquiries

If you're interested in finding out more about technology, or how confidential computing could help you collaboratebetter on data, we'd love to hear from you at

contact@datalign.co.uk

); }; export default Index;
